item.title: The 9 most anticipated gadgets of 2016
item.description:
The 9 most anticipated gadgets of 2016

The top nine bits of tech we're looking forward to this year

item.title: Will Samsung Galaxy Note 6 Live Up to Fans' Expectations? - Neurogadget.com
item.description:
Will Samsung Galaxy Note 6 Live Up to Fans' Expectations? - Neurogadget.com

As we all know, Samsung is quite popular because of its Note series phablets, rather than its S series handsets. However, the Galaxy Note 5 device didn't impress many people, and the device was not sold as well as many have expected.

item.title: Samsung Smartphones Updated With Ad Blocking Support
item.description:
Samsung Smartphones Updated With Ad Blocking Support

There are currently apps available for Android that allows users to block ads, but for the most part users have always had to resort to third-party solutions. However according to a report from The Verge, it looks like Samsung wants to bake in those features into their phones by default, and have recently pushed out an update for its devices.

item.title: Samsung Challenges Google With Chrome-Busting Browser
item.description:
Samsung Challenges Google With Chrome-Busting Browser

Samsung has begun to roll out the latest version of the Android-powered Samsung Browser found in the latest Galaxy smartphones and phablets. It should become available within the coming weeks, and it represents Samsung's desire to create a browser built around compatibility, functionality, and ease of use.

item.title: Apple To Go Into Augmented Reality? Secretly Building VR Tech To Rival Microsoft's Hololens
item.description:
Apple To Go Into Augmented Reality? Secretly Building VR Tech To Rival Microsoft's Hololens

Apple is reportedly creating an augmented reality device to go up against Microsoft's Hololens. Apple didn't look like it was interested in making the jump into augmented reality, however, the buzz about the quality of Hololens and Oculus Rift may have ignited their competitive spirit.

item.title: Official Reddit Android App: Closed Beta Testing Starts, iOS App to Follow Soon
item.description:
Official Reddit Android App: Closed Beta Testing Starts, iOS App to Follow Soon

Redditors, it's time to rejoice. The official Reddit Android app has begun closed beta testing and should be available for Android and iOS soon. The beta testing is currently only available for Android users, as Reddit is testing its Android app. The company says that an iOS beta should soon be available for testing.

item.title: Next Gen iPad Air Case Leak: Apple Gives iPad Air 3 iPad Pro Speakers, Smart Connector Accessories, LED Flash
item.description:
Next Gen iPad Air Case Leak: Apple Gives iPad Air 3 iPad Pro Speakers, Smart Connector Accessories, LED Flash

Apple's iPad Air 3 will have a Smart Connector, iPad Pro speakers, as well as LED flash if photos and sketches of the next generation iPad Air reported by 9 To 5 Mac prove to be true. The most recent leaked designs from third-party sources spotted by Macotakara reveal iPad cases in production align with previous rumors regarding the next iPad Air's features.

item.title: The Asus VivoMini VC65 is a mini PC that's not small on storage
item.description:
The Asus VivoMini VC65 is a mini PC that's not small on storage

With small size comes small storage capacity. At least that's how it still tends to be for computers. But Asus is aiming to change some of that notion by expanding its VivoMini line of mini PCs. The computer supports up to four 2.5-inch hard drives or storage state drives.

item.title: New Nintendo 3DS Games: Will We Ever See A Lot Of Exclusives?
item.description:
New Nintendo 3DS Games: Will We Ever See A Lot Of Exclusives?

Let's get real, folks: The New Nintendo 3DS has been out for almost a year now, and it still only has two exclusive games for it: Xenoblade Chronicles 3D and The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth . Games were never the main reason to upgrade from a regular Nintendo 3DS, but still, just two?

item.title: Asus ZenFone 3 release date: handset to have 2 versions?
item.description:
Asus ZenFone 3 release date: handset to have 2 versions?

When Asus launched the ZenFone 2, fans were treated to different iterations of the lineup, ranging from the base model to a premium Deluxe Edition. Now that there are talks of Asus launching a ZenFone 3 this year, observers are already expecting that the new flagship will also have a number of ...
